title: Getting Over You
lyrics:
Running from the morning
Think I hit a wall
Late nights, not you
Running from the moment
So I don’t recall
Late nights, not you

Waking up in a cold sweat

Someone else in this cold bed

I’d do anything to not be alone

All alone with the ceiling

All alone with this feeling

And I wonder if I’ll ever let go



I tried spending my nights under

Someone new

But the truth is

I could spend my whole life getting over you



Yeah yeah yeah

Getting over you

Getting over you

Getting over you

Getting over you

Getting over you

Getting over you



Drowning in my coffee

To wash the alcohol

Out my bloodstream

Sitting here I wonder

If we hadn’t been at all

Who would I be

Waking up in a cold sweat

Someone else in this cold bed

And I wonder if I’ll ever let go



I tried spending

My nights under

Someone new

But the truth is

I could spend my whole life getting over you



Yeah yeah yeah

Getting over you

Getting over you

Getting over you

Getting over you

Getting over you

Getting over you



I tried spending

My nights under

Someone new

But the truth is

I could spend my whole life getting over you



Getting over you

Getting over you

Getting over you

Getting over you
